texte.text: © 2000-2007 Nintendo and extra toxic. All rights reserved.
Max. # of knocked out chicks per game (pro mode)
Do you really want to erase your records?
Mario Plays The #1 Black People Sport
Mario and friends decide that its a good idea to play sports meant for niggas, when he is quite obviously a white male.
Let's be honest here, NOBODY knows what this game is, but it might be good.

Pokémon Ranger is a new type of Pokémon game made especially for Nintendo DS. Instead of playing a Pokémon Trainer you play a Ranger, responsible for protecting Pokémon in the wild. Capturing Pokémon is also handled in a whole new way; using a Capture Styler you must catch Pokémon by quickly drawing circles around them with your stylus.

One of the development concepts for Wii was the idea of “increasing the number of channels on the family TV set.” Of course, since Wii is a game console, the idea of booting up a game disc in order to play games has been left intact, but much in the same way that we incorporated the internal PictoChat software on the Nintendo DS, we have also prepared some internal software for Wii.

Ace Attorney Phoenix Wright rises once again to protect the innocent and punish the lawbreakers in this sequel to one of the most surprising and original Nintendo DS hits of 2006. 'Justice for All' presents you with four new cases to investigate, each one highly complex and packed with a colourful cast of characters.

The Wario Ware team took an idea so wacky, it could only be made with the latest technology... the Wii Remote. With about 200 lightning-quick microgames and controls that range from scribbling to flailing, WarioWare: Smooth Moves takes interactive gaming to a whole new level. All players need is a Wii Remote and their best moves to be the champ.

Los Angeles, 1979. Players take the role of Kyle Hyde, an ex-cop turned salesman trying to track down a missing friend. Clues lead to an eerie, old hotel rumored to have one very strange room – a room where wishes are granted. Players check in and get ready for a night of surprises as they try to unravel the mystery in Hotel Dusk: Room 215, a gritty new graphic adventure for the Nintendo DS.

Wii Sports offers five distinct sports experiences, each using the Wii Remote to provide a natural, intuitive and realistic feel. Players can use their own Mii caricatures in the game and play them against their friends' Miis for a more personalised experience. As players improve, their Miis' skill levels will increase, so that they can see exactly how much better they've become.

Go back to the farm in the most hands-on Harvest Moon yet! Harvest Moon DS brings all the fun of the much-loved farming RPG to the dual-screened system; with touch control that lets you brush horses, shear sheep and milk cows! Living the life of a farmer you'll sow crops, tend to your livestock and even take a wife to share your dreams of rural happiness.
P Diddy Racing DS is a return to the P Diddy Racing games. Get new power ups, like baby oil traps, and a glock 18!
Problems with the download? Turn off your browser’s pop-up blocker and try again.
Let us know what you liked and didn’t like about CHICK CHICK BOOM. We won't actually look at the shit you send us, because this email is long dead!
Uh oh, the email fucked up. that's what happens when you try to use features in an 18 year old flash game.
Move the mouse over the sensitive areas to get more information.
You have to protect your five chicks from Poster Bunny’s attacks. The game is over as soon as your last chick is knocked out.
Trace the symbol on the egg to activate your attack or defense. The better your drawing is, the stronger your attack or defense.
Knock out the opposing chicks with your attacks.
On the left side, you will find the symbols you can use to protect your chicks from attacks.
On the right side, you will find the attack symbols.
Throw a bomb over the fence. The explosion can hit several chicks.
Make a huge weight fall upon the chicks.
Send your chicks to the right or left corner to save them from attacks by a bomb or a weight.
Make poisonous toadstools grow. Chicks that eat these become sluggish, with energy draining continuously.
Use the medicine to heal chicks poisoned by the toadstools.
Occasionally, clouds will appear and start to rain. When this happens, energy spending earthworms will pop up. The rain will also extinguish bomb fuses.
When the color of the clouds change to grey, lightning attacks are probable. Make sure you don’t strike your own chicks with the lightning.
Use the lightning rod to protect your chicks from lightning attacks.
If a chick gets into a balloon and floats out of sight, the chick will be lost forever.
Using sandbags, weigh the balloon down until your chick can get out.
You can pick up your reward later at the download center.
nigga do you REALLY want to do that?
Your goal: Hang in there as long as you can and beat your own records! Your opponent receives a new chick for each one he loses.
You’ve solved all 10 levels! Now, continue on to the pro-mode.
Your drawing was not precise enough. Please try again.
Lesson over... now, show us what you have learned!
Trace the template with a single line. The better you draw, the stronger is your attack.
Very good! Your attack will be executed now.
You must achieve at least 70%. Otherwise, your attack will not be executed.
Very good! Your attack will be executed now.
Now you can send your chicks to the right or left corner.
By doing this, you save the chicks from attacks by Poster Bunny.
That’s it for now. Now, cut down Poster Bunny!
Occasionally, clouds will appear and start to rain. When this happens, energy spending earthworms will pop up.
The rain will also extinguish bomb fuses.
When the color of the clouds change to grey, lightning attacks are probable. Once this happens, select the lightning symbol.
Make sure the cloud is on the other side.
Very good! Your attack will be executed now.
Use the lightning rod to protect your chicks from lightning attacks.
Chicks that eat these become sluggish, with energy draining continuously.
Very good! Your attack will be executed now.
Use the medicine to heal chicks poisoned by the toadstools.
Once in a balloon, a chick will float high into the sky.
If a chick gets into a balloon and floats out of sight, the chick will be lost forever.
Very good! Your attack will be executed now.
Using sandbags, weigh the balloon down until your chick can get out.
TIP: If you knock out several chicks with one attack, one of your chicks will receive a hardhat, which will protect the chick against attacks for a short time.
TIP: Using a single weight, hit more than one chick at once and you’ll receive two weights for your next attack.
TIP: When the sun is shining, quickly draw the medicine symbol and your chicks will get an immediate boost of energy.
TIP: Whenever a sprinkler appears, click it, as it will attract earthworms for your chicks.
TIP: If your bomb hits all five opposing chicks, one of your chicks will receive a bomb defuser kit to use for a while.
